#summary Readme for the DotA Replay Manager Filter written in C# (C-Sharp).
<wiki:toc max_depth="4" />

=== Take Note ===

    * The DRMF# version will only work with the [https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B8JoWU-WbXbeMEVfSjBEcHl6ODA qlog.exe] and does no longer need the DotA Replay Manager.
    * You need to have [http://www.microsoft.com/de-de/download/details.aspx?id=30653 Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (x86 and x64)] installed.

=== How it works ===

After you start the DRMF#, for the first time installation, go in the settings (the menu tab) and select the qlog.exe path. Save and close the settings and drag a replay or a DRM/Qlog generated log file on it and you are ready to go!

=== Result Windows ===

   * Select lines via a normal, shift or ctrl click and click on the column header to copy the lines.
   * Double click anywhere on the listview to clear the clipboard.
   * The search is case sensitive. You can query for any keywords you want or select a player's name.

=== Drag & Drop ===
Drag and drop a
   * `*`.txt file on the DRMF window to load the log content & the playerlist.
   * `*`.w3g file on the DRMF window to load the replay with qlog (and do the same as with the log.txt above).

=== Links & Paths ===

You can click on any website url or path to start/open it.
